subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Spiraling out of control
author: joel smith
full_text:
--0-205633075-1196651791=:29326
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

yes i will post what i get  if i be live it worth it that is  . it might take me awhile of playing with it and try different  things  so i do hope i can  provide so OK stuff .
  Joel . 
  and it nice meeting all of you I  have been here awhile just reading and listing  . I also  have heard the box with Chris  and have had some really  good experiences  . but other time didn't hear much, 
    one time I  did make a observation , IE as in group with about 12 to 15 people  and it seemed  to me  that the Lady's that i was there with  heard what Chris  heard. and they would laugh  before he  had  translated with wht he had heard . from this observation I have come to believe men and women hear  different frequencies . But they were defiantly hearing what Chris was .I on the other hand  heard very little that night  as the other males in the group on that night.

Steve Hultay <urkel23@...> wrote:
          
I think we should all focus at the research at hand and forget what 
everyone else is doing. I personally know Chris and think he's a 
great guy and frank feels the same way most days. This has gotten 
to the point where i can't even do a session anymore because i'm so 
blocked by negative thoughts from this group it's pointless to 
concentrate on the box and get results. Honestly who cares what 
chris does anyway, does it really affect everyone's lives that 
much. I have a job and this is a hobby that i used to really like, 
but now this board has brought me down. It seems all people want to 
do is make this like a street fight with challenges and negative 
views and for what reason? If anyone is concerned about hearing 
Chris's audio, i have about 2 hours of box sessions from Eastern 
State on my web site for all to listen to. It's 
www.keyportparanormal.com and go to investigation and click on 
eastern state. All the audio is at the bottom of that page and you 
guys can judge for yourself and i heard a lot come out of that box 
that night personally because i repeated a lot of stuff back to 
chris that i heard. Enough already, let's move on to the next great 
thing. That radio shack hack was a great breakthrough here, let's 
just be happy we got that before it was shut down. Now we have 
another avenue to go down, but we can't do it with all these 
negatives out there. Let's move on to new topics and anyone out 
there that bought a Radio Shack box, start sharing your files with 
the group so it's not just us same 5 that post all the time.

-Steve H.
